title: Kincaid Magic: Gregor
description: The Kincaid brothers bring a little magic to their town. Their family has lived there for generations...some thing they are witches, but most people don't care what they are as they help people in the town.Gregor, the oldest brother, possesses the ability to make plants grown. Pamela has known and loved Gregor all her life, but never acted on her feelings. When a baby is dropped on the brothers' doorstep with a note claiming Gregor is the father, Gregor is stunned. Reluctantly, Pamela steps in to help Gregor deal with this change in his life. When a drought hits the town, Gregor's life becomes more complicated, but he finally realizes that Pamela is the woman he wants in his life.
author: Joanna Mikalis
